name: Evolve Component Library | Karan Kapoor
description:
--Style fixes and component improvementsï»¿--


Hello Everyone,


My name is Karan Kapoor and this is my first open source contribution in form of a component library here in the Figma Community.


I've tried to cover the higher level components you can use for quick mockups and overall Designs also.


If you have any suggestions or any feedback, write to me at notkarankapoor@gmail.com.


------------------------------------------------------------


Updates in this version:

  1. Layer structure cleaned up
  2. Short video tutorials of how to use this library
  3. Default font changed to Inter
  4. Interactive component states added


Tooltips taken from @rogie.
